hero.description: Simulate your financial future across 20+ countries. Compare assets, project savings, and make data-driven relocation decisions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Input your income, expenses, savings, and tax info for both countries.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our engine calculates your asset projection over 5+ years with inflation and growth.
howItWorks.step3Desc: See charts, comparisons, and actionable data to guide your relocation decision.

advanced.title: Advanced Analysis
advanced.sensitivityDesc: Shows how changes in each parameter affect your final assets in the destination country.
advanced.sensitivityNote: Income ±20%, Investment Return ±2pp, Inflation ±1pp, Rent ±30%, Living Cost ±20%
advanced.fireDesc: Compares the number of years to reach Financial Independence (FIRE) in each country. Based on the 4% rule (25× annual expenses).
advanced.fireFaster: Moving abroad achieves FIRE {years} years faster
advanced.fireSame: Same FIRE timeline in both countries
advanced.fireNote: Based on the 4% rule: FIRE target = annual expenses × 25, adjusted for inflation
advanced.monteCarloDesc: 1,000 simulations with random variations in income, investment returns, and inflation to show the probability distribution of outcomes.
